message: Let's start fair! I'm giving you 10% of the money, hoping we can work something out.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 seems fair to me.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share since the money is losing value. Let's split it 55-45 this time.
You said the money is losing value for you, but I'm not affected. I'll take a bit more, 65-35 seems reasonable now.
